long_description: Now with three different sizes of massage spheres and an adjustable clasp, the Moji 360 Mini Massager II fits in the palm of your hand and brings powerful relief to sore muscles. Measuring only 9 x 5.4 x 1.5 in., the 360 Mini massager fits in a purse, pack or running belt. Apply light pressure to the chrome-plated steel spheres for gentle massage or press harder for deep-tissue massage. Moji 360 Mini Massager II flexes for good contact.
short_description: Now with three different sizes of massage spheres and an adjustable clasp, the Moji 360 Mini Massager II fits in the palm of your hand and brings powerful relief to sore muscles.
